benchmark_details.name: InstructVul
benchmark_details.overview: InstructVul is a new instruction-based dataset for vulnerability identification and repair system with a description and code comment generation. It consists of diverse prompts tailored to security concerns of source code vulnerabilities in C/C++.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate developers in identifying and repairing vulnerabilities in code with comprehensive descriptions.

data.source: VulDeelocator dataset and additional handcrafted examples.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on generated outputs compared to reference outputs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in identifying and describing vulnerabilities.
methodology.validation: Random sampling of generated outputs by security experts for quality evaluation.
